attributes.action: Help keep Ole Gunnar Solskjaer in his job. It would be immoral to sack him.
attributes.additional_details:
Scored the vital and historic champions League Final goal that helped the  club win the treble. Ole also played a big role in winning titles for United. This is why he deserves this opportunity and time.

It's a building process even if they haven't been winning, its a young team...it will blossom.
attributes.background:
On behalf of all non-man united supporters, we come together to ask that Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is given until the end of the season to turn things around at Man United. 

He deserves this and all the supporters of all other clubs in the league are 100% behind him and ask that he doesn't get fired.
